casebody.data:
In the Matter of Kevin P. SMITH, Appellant,
v.
Gregory LASAK, etc., et al., Respondents. Motion No: 2017-1064 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 19, 2017

On the Court's own motion, appeal dismissed, without costs, upon the ground that no substantial constitutional question is directly involved.

Motion for leave to appeal denied.
